result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Request for Adjournment of 11/07/22 Preliminary Hearing
APPROVED 11/2/22

Clerk: Amanda. 
Case called at 9:15 am.
Defendant appears in person. 

S.M.H. sworn and testifies. 
Court questions defendant RE: Employment/Income. 
Court appoints Attorney Michael Hughes @ $100/hr. not to exceed $1000 without further order of the Court. 


Adj: 9:17 am.

Indigency hearing on October 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary Hearing on November 7, 2022 at 09:10 am.
Pre-trial conference on November 21, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  No possession of drug paraphernalia.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (1) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 3:29 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Greg Venturini, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
IH: 10/27/22 @ 9:00 a.m. 
PH: 11/7/22 @ 9:10 a.m. 
PTC W/JA: 11/21/22 @ 3:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 3:32 p.m.
